name: Ext_R2_Condition_abatement
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Condition.abatement[x] for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Condition.abatement[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Condition|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The date or estimated date that the condition resolved or went into remission. This is called "abatement" because of the many overloaded connotations associated with "remission" or "resolution" - Conditions are never really resolved, but they can abate.
element.comment: `Condition.abatement[x]` maps to R4 `Condition.abatement[x]`. Type `boolean` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
